verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'When<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> a <S%H2100>discharge<s%> from his <S%H1320>body,<s%> his <S%H2101>discharge<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

<S%H2088>'This,<s%> moreover, shall be his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> in his <S%H2101>discharge:<s%> it is his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> whether his <S%H1320>body<s%> allows its <S%H2101>discharge<s%> to <S%H7388>flow,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> whether his <S%H1320>body<s%> <S%H2856>obstructs<s%> its <S%H2101>discharge.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Every<s%> <S%H4904>bed<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>person<s%> with the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H3627><s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3427>sits<s%> <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

<S%H376>'Anyone,<s%> moreover, <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> his <S%H4904>bed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening;<s%>

and whoever <S%H3427>sits<s%> on the <S%H3627>thing<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> the man with the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> has been <S%H3427>sitting,<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'Also whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H1320>person<s%> with the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'Or <S%H3588>if<s%> the man with the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H7556>spits<s%> on one <S%H2889>who<s%> is <S%H2889>clean,<s%> he too shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>
'And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4817>saddle<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> the person with the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H7392>rides<s%> <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Whoever<s%> then <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of the things <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H8478>under<s%> him shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and he who <S%H5375>carries<s%> them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'Likewise, <S%H3605>whomever<s%> <S%H834><s%> the one with the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> having <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'However, an <S%H2789>earthenware<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the person with the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>wooden<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> shall be <S%H7857>rinsed<s%> in <S%H4325>water.<s%>

'Now <S%H3588>when<s%> the man with the <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H2891>becomes<s%> <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from his <S%H2101>discharge,<s%> then he shall <S%H5608>count<s%> off for himself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing;<s%> he shall then <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> in <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> and shall <S%H2891>become<s%> <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> for himself <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> them, <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%> So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on his <S%H5921>behalf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of his <S%H2101>discharge.<s%>

'Now <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3318>has<s%> a <S%H2233>seminal<s%> <S%H7902>emission,<s%> he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'As for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H899>garment<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5785>leather<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> there is <S%H2233>seminal<s%> <S%H7902>emission,<s%> it shall be <S%H3526>washed<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> [so that] there is a <S%H2233>seminal<s%> <S%H7902>emission,<s%> they shall both <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H3588>'When<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> a <S%H2100>discharge,<s%> [if] her <S%H2101>discharge<s%> in her <S%H1320>body<s%> is <S%H1818>blood,<s%> she shall <S%H1961>continue<s%> in her <S%H5079>menstrual<s%> <S%H5079>impurity<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> her shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Everything<s%> also on <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H7901>lies<s%> during her <S%H5079>menstrual<s%> <S%H5079>impurity<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and <S%H3605>everything<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H3427>sits<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

'And <S%H3605>anyone<s%> who <S%H5060>touches<s%> her <S%H4904>bed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'And <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>thing<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H3427>sits<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H518>'Whether<s%> it be on the <S%H4904>bed<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> on the <S%H3627>thing<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> she is <S%H3427>sitting,<s%> when he <S%H5060>touches<s%> it, he shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

'And <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>actually<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with her, so that her <S%H5079>menstrual<s%> <S%H5079>impurity<s%> is on him, he shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4904>bed<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7901>lies<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

'Now <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2100>has<s%> a <S%H2101>discharge<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> not at the <S%H6256>period<s%> of her <S%H5079>menstrual<s%> <S%H5079>impurity,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> she <S%H2100>has<s%> a <S%H2100>discharge<s%> <S%H5921>beyond<s%> that <S%H5079>period,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2932>impure<s%> <S%H2101>discharge<s%> she shall <S%H1961>continue<s%> as though in her <S%H5079>menstrual<s%> <S%H5079>impurity;<s%> she is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Any<s%> <S%H4904>bed<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2101>discharge<s%> shall be to her like her <S%H4904>bed<s%> at <S%H5079>menstruation;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3627>thing<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H3427>sits<s%> shall be <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> like her <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> at that <S%H5079>time.<s%>

'Likewise, <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> them shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> and shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H518>'When<s%> she <S%H2891>becomes<s%> <S%H2891>clean<s%> from her <S%H2101>discharge,<s%> she shall <S%H5608>count<s%> off for herself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> she shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> she shall <S%H3947>take<s%> for herself <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> them in to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%> So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on her <S%H5921>behalf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of her <S%H2932>impure<s%> <S%H2101>discharge.<s%>'

"Thus you shall <S%H5144>keep<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5144>separated<s%> from their <S%H2932>uncleanness,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> they <S%H4191>die<s%> in their <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> by their <S%H2930>defiling<s%> My <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> that is <S%H8432>among<s%> them."

<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> for the one with a <S%H2100>discharge,<s%> and for the man <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3318>has<s%> a <S%H2233>seminal<s%> <S%H7902>emission<s%> so that he is <S%H2930>unclean<s%> by it,

and for the <S%H1739>woman<s%> <S%H1739>who<s%> is <S%H1739>ill<s%> because of <S%H5079>menstrual<s%> <S%H5079>impurity,<s%> and for the one who has a <S%H2101>discharge,<s%> whether a <S%H2145>male<s%> or a <S%H5347>female,<s%> or a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H2931>woman.<s%>
